Description: Available September 1st! Do not miss this 2 bed 1 bath apartment in Newton Corner on a dead-end road. This apartment has a fantastic open layout with a large kitchen and a spacious dining room. Enjoy its close proximity to the West Suburban YMCA, Wholefoods Market, Jackson Walnut Park School, Farlow Park, Massachusetts Turnpike, the Charles River, Cabot Elementary School, Boston College, and much more! Utilities are not included. 2 car off-street parking. basement Storage. Coin-Laundry in Basement. Sorry, no pets. Required Up-Front: First, Last, Broker Fee. Schedule a Showing! No Pets Allowed (RLNE8180886)
